Offscreen Magazine — a print magazine about pixel people

08 Jan 2013

http://www.offscreenmag.com/
Ordered my first copy of this earlier today looks really nice. The design reminds me of Monocle but for the web. Cant wait for it to arrive.

Offscreen is a new periodical with an in-depth look at the life and work of digital creators — captured in enduring print. Ever wondered what goes on behind the scenes of the websites and apps you use everyday? We invite you to turn off your device, grab a cup of coffee and meet their makers off screen.
